<template>
    <form-wizard>
        <tab-content title="Lodgement details">
            First tab for lodgement information
        </tab-content>
        <tab-content title="Charges & Payments">
            Tab for charges and payments
        </tab-content>
        <tab-content title="Confirm">
            Yuhuuu! This seems pretty damn simple
        </tab-content>
    </form-wizard>
</template>

<script>
//local registration
import {FormWizard, TabContent} from 'vue-form-wizard';
import { validationMixin } from 'vuelidate';
// import { required, minValue, alpha, minLength, numeric, decimal } from 'vuelidate/lib/validators';


export default {
    name: 'CreateLodgementWizardNew',
    mixins: [validationMixin],
    components: {
        FormWizard,
        TabContent
    }
}
</script>
